name: SortingGameforHarryPotter
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sorting game
des:
Answer the Sorting Hat's questions to find out to which Hogwarts house you belong! But remember... answer carefully and truthfully because there's nothing hidden in your head that the Sorting Hat can't see!

UPDATE:
* Thanks for all the honest reviews! The skill has been greatly improved based on user feedback, please give the updated skill a try!
* Greatly improved voice interaction
* Fixed crashes
* Game is smoother and quicker
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
